title: Game Progress Route
content:
18. Once successful, you can now freely roam the area without fighting the hound. There are more chests that you can unlock in this area as well and pick up valuable items such as elixirs and scrolls.

There's another locked door here, that will lead to a different room. Unlocking this door will require you to pass a DC of 15. Inside this room, you will find more chests to loot and letters to discover. The unique chest can be found at the foot of the bed where it transforms into a Mimic the mom
